from typing import List, Union
from accessor import getValue, setValue

def on_single_select_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setValue(['single_select_value'], value)
    return

def on_multi_select_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setValue(['multi_select_value'], value)
    return

def on_select_with_default_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setValue(['select_with_default_value'], value)
    return

def init():
    ### Get value of 1st select
    single_select_value = getValue(['single_select'])

    ### Get value of 2nd select
    multi_select_value = getValue(['multi_select'])

    ### Get value of 3rd select
    select_with_default_value = getValue(['select_with_default'])
    setValue(['select_with_default_value'], select_with_default_value)

    return

init()
